about.heading: Designing with empathy, building with purpose.
about.description: Hi, I'm Michelle Heatherly. I'm a Full-Stack Software Engineer, with 9+ years of experience and a BA in Computer Science. My passion is creating digital products that balance aesthetics, accessibility, and performance— merging digital design with engineering discipline. My goal is simple: Create experiences that feel effortless to use and meaningful to the people using them.
